alert.note: Alert for Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:43AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...SHOWERS WITH ISOLATED THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN YELLOWSTONE... SOUTHEASTERN MUSSELSHELL...NORTHERN ROSEBUD AND NORTHWESTERN TREASURE COUNTIES THROUGH 345 AM MDT... At 238 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of showers and isolated thunderstorms 12 miles southeast of Melstone, or 24 miles northwest of Hysham, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...These showers and thunderstorms were producing heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Torrential rainfall will cause quick water rises on streams and ditches, which could cause minor low land flooding. Also, ponding of water will develop on roadways. Locations impacted include... Ingomar. This activity will stay northeast of Billings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure
